content.text:
I wanted to codify my interpretation of the above while it's still fresh on my mind, so here's a first stab at some ABNF:

```
scheme              = "ssb"
unreserved          = ALPHA / DIGIT / "-" / "." / "_" / "~"
pct-encoded         = "%" HEXDIG HEXDIG
sub-delims          = "!" / "$" / "&" / "'" / "(" / ")"
                    / "*" / "+" / "," / ";" / "="
segment-nz-nc       = 1*( unreserved / pct-encoded / sub-delims / "@" )
query               = *( pchar / "/" / "?" )
pchar               = unreserved / pct-encoded / sub-delims / ":" / "@"
fragment            = *( pchar / "/" / "?" )
delimiter           = ":"

segment-part        = *1( delimiter segment-nz-nc)
type                = delimiter *1(unreserved)
common-type         = delimiter ( "feed" / "message" / "blob" / "channel" )
algorithm           = delimiter *1(unreserved)
common-algorithm    = delimiter ( "sha256" / "ed25519" )
integer             = ":" *1(unreserved)
base64-integer      = delimiter 44( ALPHA / DIGIT / "-" / "_" / "=")

URI-general         = scheme segment-part [ "?" query ] [ "#" fragment ]
URI-basic           = scheme type algorithm integer
URI-common          = scheme common-type common-algorithm base64-integer
```

- URI-common would allow <ssb:feed:ed25519:TNl1qw6I4dorbnx2i-chCDYh/CAgD-rFAPfXJ7yUTBY=>
- URI-basic would allow <ssb:property:sha-512:07bcffb2ff031dd88351428c80268ac6>
- URI-general would allow <ssb:milky-way:earth:msg:chess:move:sha999:this-is-fine-everything-is-fine>
